body:
Price Target Update: Analysts are estimating that Oracle Corporation (ORCL) to hit $44.69 Price Target in next one year, this mean price is come up through the consensus of analysts. The Median price target for the stock is set at $45.00. Highest potential price target is expected at $52.00 however minimum price target advised by analysts is $31.00. Essentially, a price target is an individual analyst’s expectation on the future price of a security, usually a stock. There may be many price targets for a single security. An influential analyst on Wall Street may give a stock that is currently trading at $60 a one-year price target of $90; however, there is no concrete way to calculate a price target. Different analysts and financial institutions use various valuation methods and take into account different economic forces when deciding on a price target.

Oracle Corporation’s (ORCL) stock price ended its day with a gain of 0.25% and finalized at the price of $40.23. During its last trading session, Stock traded with the total exchanged volume of 9.23 million shares. The average volume stands around 13.08 million shares. The average numbers of shares are traded in a security per day, during the recent 3-month period. The stock has relative volume of 0.71. Relative volume is ratio between current volume and 3-month average value, intraday adjusted. Oracle Corporation’s (ORCL) is a part of Technology sector and belongs to Application Software industry.

ATR value of company was 0.47. Average True Range (ATR) is an indicator based on trading ranges smoothed by an N-period exponential moving average percentage of the true range values. ATR can display volatility of stocks, ETFs and indexes. The principal of ATR is very similar to other volatility indicators: A high ATR value signals a possible trend change. A low ATR value correlates with a weaker trend movement.

USA based company, Oracle Corporation’s (ORCL)’s latest closing price distance was 1.67% from the average-price of 200 days while it maintained a distance from the 50 Day Moving Average at 2.12% and 2.83% compared with the 20 Day Moving Average.

To review the ORCL previous performance, look at its past history, which highlighted below:

During last 5 trades the stock sticks almost 0.90%.

During last one month it showed the change of 4.04%.

During last 3 month it remained at 5.42%.

During last 12 month it moved at 15.61%.

Along with these its year to date performance is standing at 5.04%.

Relative Strength Index (RSI) was 62.75. The stock volatility for week was 1.06% while for month was 1.14%.The stock, as of last close, traded 18.49% to its 52 week low and was changed -3.26% from its 52 week high. Beta factor, which measures the riskiness of the security, was observed as 1.14. ORCL’s value Change from Open was at 0.07% with a Gap of 0.17%.

EPS in next five year years is expected to touch 8.46% while EPS growth in past 5 year was 4.40% along with sales growth of 0.80% in the last five years.

EPS growth in next year is estimated to reach 9.05% while EPS growth estimate for this year is set at -6.30%.

The price/earnings ratio (P/E) is 19.29 and the forward P/E ratio stands at 14.39. The price to earnings growth is 2.28 and the price to sales ratio is 17. It has a dividend yield of 1.49%.

Analysts’ mean recommendation for Oracle Corporation’s (ORCL) stands at 2.30. Rating Scale; where 1.0 rating means Strong Buy, 2.0 rating signify Buy, 3.0 recommendation reveals Hold, 4.0 rating score shows Sell and 5.0 displays Strong Sell signal.
title: Maximum Upside Potential: Oracle Corporation's (ORCL) stock price is Currently Worth at $40.23; How much it may Go up in next one Year Period?
